description: This contract is closed (expired) for procurement purpose of good.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Contract Opportunity Notice

**Title:** Support for Radio Receivers

**Reference Number:** cb-6450-70498319

**Publication Date:** June 15, 2023

**Closing Date:** June 30, 2023 at 14:00 (UTC-5)

**Contract Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) with Competitive Open Bidding

**Description:**

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids from contractors to provide support for radio receivers, as detailed below:

* Item 1: Miscellaneous Communications Equipment (GSIN 5895)
	+ Quantity: Up to 600 units
	+ Delivery: Various locations across Eastern Ontario
	+ Part Number: MRC-UVA-V1
	+ NSN: 5895-20-A0Y-3346 (superseded by 5895-01-708-4517)

**Key Contract Details:**

* Expected Contract Start Date: July 10, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: July 9, 2028
* Region of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR), Ontario (except NCR)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding with Lowest Price as the selection criterion
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Language: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)

**Contact Information:**

Nicole Summers-Van Ness
nicole.summers-van-ness@forces.gc.ca
(613) 945-2171

**Attachments:**

Tender Notice (English) - available here: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6450/1_rfso_w6399_22_li75_a_en.pdf>
Tender Notice (French) - available here: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6450/1_rfso_w6399_22_li75_a_fr.pdf>

**Additional Information:**

* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Bidders must provide documentation in either English or French.
* Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly identified.

**Submission Deadline:**

June 30, 2023 at 14:00 (UTC-5).

By [Your Name], Technical Writer. 400 words rewritten, condensing repeating information, rephrasing unclear statements, standardising heading formatting, with a
